job_history.name: Biogen
job_history.description:
Full-Stack developer and tech lead of a multi-language and multi-country platform for healthcare professionals.

I worked on various features such as:
- Content management flow (Contentful APIs and tools, GitLab CI/CD, Next.js)
- Virtual event streaming (Zoom API, Brightcove CDN)
- Custom registration and validation processes (Akamai Identity Cloud, GraphQL, DynamoDB)
- Automatic deployments to AWS (Terraform, AWS, GitLab CI/CD)
- UI component library (React, TypeScript, styled-components, Storybook)
- URLs and content localization (Next.js, Lokalise).

Achievements:
- Reduced EC2 costs more than 80% by running all countries in a single EC2 instance per environment instead of one instance per country per environment.
- Create a tool for automating the PRC (which is a Pharma term for content validation) by generating PDF's of a set of URLs navigating through the content and taking screenshots of all the dynamic elements on the page.
- Rebuilt our CI/CD workflow and environments to reduce build time. Move to single artifact deployments.

job_history.name: 2am. technologies
job_history.description:
Frontend Tech Lead and Senior Engineer. Worked on a released and profitable Content Collaboration tool built with React following DDD principles. Designed a Chat Application for a client. Built a PDF annotation tool.

Main used technologies were Vue.js and React

job_history.name: Air Europa
job_history.description: As part of the maintenance team of Air Europa website I participated in the entire rebuild of legacy to new site using Vue.js. I also worked on the maintenance of the backend build with Java.

job_history.name: Brujula Tecnologías de la Información S.A
job_history.description:
As a Developer in Brújula Tecnologías de la Información I worked primely for a big multinational online traveling agency. I developed my skills on the Backend using Java and worked on the Frontend with JavaScript. It was my first time working with a very big team and methodologies like Kanban.

I was part of the team that delivered the MVP of the eDreams Prime subscription. Now this subscription has 5 million users.

job_history.name: Soluciones Corporativas IP (SCIP)
job_history.description: Worked on an email parser and SPAM filter built with PHP. Intensive use of Regular Expressions.

job_history.name: 2am. technologies
job_history.description:
Internship with 2am I built and released two hybrid mobile applications using ionic.js and Cordova. Also worked on a social media application.

Used mainly AngularJS, gulp, grunt, ionic framework, CSS preprocessors like SASS or LESS.

By the end of the internship I was managing small projects on my own from the definition of the requirements to execution and deployment.

education_history.name: IES Manacor
education_history.description: Develop, implement and maintain web applications, regardless of the model used and using specific technologies, guaranteeing access to data in a secure way and meeting the criteria of accessibility, usability and quality required in the established standards.
